function

Class TimeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • function.TimeHandler

  • public class TimeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class TimeHandler provides control of whole application, time of simulation and tasks associated with time.
    Author:
    Martin Hamet

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TimeHandler.Time
      Class represents time in simulation and provides easy String output for UI
